# Hachi AI

> Conversational AI Agents + Multichannel CRM Platform

Hachi is an enterprise-grade platform that combines cognitive AI agents built with LangGraph with a unified multichannel CRM. Our agents feature dynamic conversation flows, persistent memory, self-correction capabilities, and human-in-the-loop supervision.

## Core Pages

- [Homepage (English)](https://hachi.live/): Main landing page with product overview, features, pricing, and contact form
- [Homepage (Spanish)](https://hachi.live/es/): Spanish version of the landing page

## Key Sections

- [AI Agents](https://hachi.live/#agents): Details about our cognitive AI agents and their capabilities
- [Features](https://hachi.live/#features): Platform features including multichannel integration, analytics, and automation
- [Pricing](https://hachi.live/#pricing): Three pricing tiers - Starter ($99/mo), Professional ($249/mo), Enterprise ($499/mo)
- [Contact](https://hachi.live/#contact): Request a demo or get in touch

## Product Information

### What Hachi Does
- **Conversational AI Agents**: Cognitive agents with dynamic flows, not simple chatbots
- **Multichannel CRM**: Unified inbox for WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook, Telegram, Email, SMS, Web Chat
- **LangGraph Architecture**: State machines with memory, self-correction, and parallel processing
- **Human-in-the-Loop**: Seamless handoff to human agents when needed

### Technology Stack
- Built with LangGraph (superior to LangChain ReAct agents)
- Supports Claude, OpenAI, DeepSeek, and other LLM providers
- Integrations: Twilio, Meta Business API, LinkedIn

### Target Industries
- Healthcare & Hospitals
- E-commerce & Retail
- Customer Service
- Sales Automation

### Competitive Advantages vs Alternatives
Compared to LangChain agents and n8n workflows, Hachi's LangGraph-based agents offer:
- Dynamic conversation flow control
- Persistent cross-session memory
- Self-correction and error recovery
- True multi-agent coordination
- Streaming responses
- Parallel tool execution
